review_data.title: Authentisch und SEHR LECKER

review_data.title: Für spontane Besuche
review_data.content: Gutes Thai Essen mit Thai-Flair. Extrawünsche sind kein problem. Kartenzahlung auch möglich. Klein aber Fein.

review_data.title: Bestes Essen & familiär!

review_data.title: Super essen wie in Thailand

review_data.title: Feeling teleported to thailand
review_data.content: Atmosphere and food like in thailand.so far best thai food i have eaten in zuri and and tried a few.

review_data.title: easy, schnell, frisch, typisch thai
review_data.content: ich komme häufig alleine ins phuket. rasche bedienung, typisch thai, speisen fein, schöne auswahl typischer thai gerichte. authentisch, viele thais...More

review_data.title: Ordered 4 different dishes, tasted all the same
review_data.content: The place really is like a family business in Thailand, but the chefs are very bad. Green curry, phad khing and pepper curry tasted about the same... Go to lilis instead or even better to chiang Mai if open...

review_data.title: thai Taste

review_data.title: Real phuket feeling
review_data.content: The Phuket Asia Center is a typical asian restaurant. I felt immediately like in Phuket! The red plastic chairs, the open kitchen and naturally the Singha beer are only a few things you can find there! The food was delicious and the people very friendly!...More

review_data.title: Wunderbar!
review_data.content: Es war wie Ferien! Sieht nicht unbedingt einladend aus, die Luft ist dick, aber das Essen... einfach gut, frisch, lecker,...More

review_data.title: Authentisch, lecker, empfohlen!
review_data.content: Super Thai Food, ohne falsche Rücksicht auf hiesige Essensgewohnheiten. Grosse Auswahl und alles überzeugt. Service ist freundlich aber minimal aber...More

review_data.title: Bester Thai in Zürich
review_data.content: Authentisch,frisch, Preis-Leistung sehr gut. Schlichtes Ambiente, man fühlt sich in Thailand. Sehr gutes Paneng Curry, ebenso zu empfehlen das Laab...More

review_data.title: Awesome Take-away
review_data.content: The food is just perfect and fresh. For having tried a lot of thai restaurants in ZH, this one is definitely in the top 3!

review_data.title: Best of Thai
review_data.content: Bestes Essen und bester Service in Mamas Küchenambiente! Die besten Pulet Spiessli und Frühlingsrollen ever!

review_data.title: Just like in Thailand
review_data.content: Don't be put off by the grocery store cum restaurant appearance of Phuket Asia Center. It is well worth a visit. If you have ever been to Thailand; then, you are all to well familiar with this type of store front restaurant. This, is not...More

review_data.title: Amazing Thai food!
review_data.content: The restaurant looks shabby, interior is basic, half the restaurant is a Thai shop and service is soso. BUT: the food is amazing! My favorite Thai in Zurich (panang curry my favorite dish).

review_data.title: Authentischer Thaifood, authentisches Ambiente
review_data.content: Ich habe bis jetzt jedes mal sehr gut gegessen im Phuket. Das Essen wird frisch zubereitet und schmeckt so, wie...More

review_data.title: Lunch
review_data.content: You can find any kind of Thai food in this restaurant even restaurants in Thailand is hard to find the place like this. If you are looking for Thai food for The real Thai tastes this place wouldn't disappoint you

review_data.title: Der beste Thai in Zürich
review_data.content: Schlicht der beste Thai in ganz Zürich. Authentisch und preiswert. Die Lage ist etwas gewöhnungsbedürftigt (Rotlichtviertel).

review_data.title: Best red beef curry in Zürich
review_data.content: I have never eaten a better red beef curry in Zürich. The vegetables, the whole composition of the dish.. it just magically fits together. I have tried other places in Zurich and I was always disappointed when the curry didn't match the flavour of the...More

review_data.title: The Real Thai Stuff
review_data.content: Hi everybody! Wanderlust? Missing the Thai experience? A short visit to Phuket Restaurant will fix it all!!!! Totally authentic, no eurasian style food. Give it a try!

review_data.title: Thai Take Away mit extrem guter Küche
review_data.content: Mit 8 Tischen kleines Take-Away Restaurant, aber sehr gute Küche für Liebhaber von original Thai-Geschmack im Essen.

review_data.title: Authentisch und fein -> wie in Thailand halt!
review_data.content: Das Phuket Asia Center ist einer meiner Lieblings-Thais in Zürich. Das Roi-Et vis-a-vis ist auch sehr gut. Was mir am...More

review_data.title: Simple and Delicious Thai food in Zurich
review_data.content: I enjoy eating when I am in Zurich for meeting friends. The food is delicious and also cheaper than other restaurants. The staff here is very nice and friendly that made us feel relax.

review_data.title: Überraschend authentisch und gut!
review_data.content: Ich liebe Thai Food und war auch schon mehrfach in Thailand. Entsprechend schwierig finde ich es, in Zürich einen richtig...More

review_data.title: Worth trying
review_data.content: Fast service but not professional. The chef took order by herself so you can tailor-made your dish. Food is ok and big portion. They've got high chair for children.

review_data.title: Good Food, Always Seats Available
review_data.content: I come to Phuket Asia Center quite often, when other Thai restaurants such as Thai Corner or Roi Et in Langstrasse area are full. There is always an empty table available, and the service is prompt although unprofessional. They used to carry some grocery, but...More

review_data.title: Small but relaxing Thai eatery!
review_data.content: My friends came here before and liked the cozy cheesy atmosphere and good food, so we came here for the first time. Before we came, we pre-ordered a whole fish (big size pleeeeze!) by phone. As it tuned out, it was unexpectedly the BEST Thai...More

review_data.title: Thai self service
review_data.content: Delicious noodle soups on Wednesday and Saturdays. Great Thai Sukiyaki on order. Very simple place in the red light district of Zurich.
